column3: College of Science, Engineering and Food Science
column5: The MSc Human Nutrition and Dietetics is an integrated postgraduate course which enables graduates with a BSc or MSc in Nutrition or equivalent degree to meet the standards of proficiency and professional competency so they are eligible to apply to the Dietitians Registration Board (CORU) for registration as a dietitian. The programme is delivered full-time over two calendar years.
column7: The EU fee for this course is €12,130 year 1; €12,130 year 2.
